question: There have been some problems with the bus service, especially its reliability, in your area over the last two weeks.Write a letter to the manager of the bus company. In your letter• describe what the problems are• explain how these problems are affecting you• suggest what you would like the company to doYou do NOT need to write any addresses.You should write at least 150 words.
text: I am writing this letter regarding several issues with your mean of  transport  during the previous fifteen days. Moreover, the citizens of my town are complaining about the transparency of your office and are demanding from me to represent their complaints.

As a matter of fact, I booked my monthly ticket online on the first of June, but when I attempt to use it at your bus station, the card machine alerted insufficient funds. Furthermore, I tried to call your IT department plenty of times which insists that no technical problems in the digital system.

Unfortunately, I am forced to stay long hours at your ticketing booth where a huge human's traffic is waiting in order to get a one-day pass. In addition to that, I am wasting a significant amount of money compared to my formal subscription that costs only thirty pounds per month.

Therefore, I would suggest that your company refund all the payment fees that belong to the resident of this region. Additionally, I would recommend that you fix your inconvenient service as soon as possible otherwise I will be obliged to ask my lawyer to file a suit against your firm in a court of law.
Your prompt action is highly required.
